Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; part of lotus flower in added red and added white; exterior: diagonal strokes between bands at rim; below, part of one pendant triangle as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1537) (phase 2)
